pages.text: Scorch is the kekki genkai of fire and wind, it currently has 3 moves.

pages.title: spawn scorch orb
pages.text: upon use of this jutsu the user will summon orbs that circle around their head, doing rapid contact damage to anything touched.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra cost:100$(li)Jutsuxp needed:150

pages.title: steam kill
pages.text: upon use of this jutsu the user will launch one of their orbs to chase and deal damage to any mobs it makes contact with, it will only launch 1 at a time however it can be used multiple times.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:50$(li)Jutsuxp needed:200

pages.title: Super steam blast
pages.text: upon using this move the user will combine all of their orbs into one before launching it where they are aiming$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:50$(li)Jutsuxp needed:250
